item.description: Introducing and guide of all the design patterns in game development.

item.description: Abstraction and system layered design in game developmnet

item.description: Introduction and usage examples of Gizmos

item.description: Introduction to hot update ideas and several commonly used hot update methods

item.description: Introduction and usage of older and new input system

item.description: Introduction the thinking of Interface Oriented

item.description: Introductiond the concept and use of Layer

item.description: Introductions the idea of loose coupling and serveral common loose coupling practice(Delegate/Event, Interface and Abstract, ScriptabbleObject, EventBus, DI/Service Locate), as well as example of anti-patterns

item.description: Introduction mask principle and usage in Unity

item.description: Introduction Model and Model in Unity

item.description: Comparison of Mono and IL2CPP modes
